metadata.name: Suspicious Execution of Shutdown to Log Out
metadata.comment: Detects the rare use of the command line tool shutdown to logoff a user

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\shutdown.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/l')))

output.summary: Detects the rare use of the command line tool shutdown to logoff a user
